com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.utility

Class NetComThreadFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.thorbenkuck.netcom2.utility.NetComThreadFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreadFactory

    public class NetComThreadFactory
extends Object
implements ThreadFactory
    This ThreadFactory is primarily used to give to ExecutorServices in order to generate NetCom2's own Threads.

    It allows to change whether newly spawned Threads should be daemon or not.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0

      void setDaemon(boolean daemon)
